text:
"I love humans."
I said from above, like royalty.

name: Hastur
text:
I held out my hand to the human in front of me,
and began to dance a rondo.

name: Hastur
text:
At the center of the universe,
where the hands of the clock turned round and round.

name: Hastur
text:
Ah, how I love you.
How fleeting, how adorable, and how fragile.

name: Hastur
text:
Just as a prince at a ball found his Cinderella,
I, a higher being, was captivated at first sight.

name: Hastur
text:
I treat my partner with the utmost care, akin to a human
handling a small animal, so as not to break them.

name: Hastur
text:
As a result,
my demeanor is truly befitting that of a prince.

Heat radiated from my tentacles and hand.
The fire of passion rose from deep within my core, as if to burn at my very existence.

No earthly plague could harm me, Hastur.
Yet this flame was burning so intensely, it felt like it would consume me.

The two of us drew closer.
I imagined what would happen next, and my expression softened.

After a blissful kiss,
the two of us were to be forever bound in a happy ending.

name: Hastur
text:
Wait... something's wrong.
Why am I dancing with a frail human in the first place?

name: Hastur
text:
If I touch you, you'll be infected with fever, drought, and plague.
Death would be a mercy. So why are you so nonchalant of such a matter?

I looked deep into your eyes.
Within them, was the light of my fated enemy.
This was after the Santa Departure Ceremony and the subsequent trouble.

At the Christmas Snowland Castle event,
the higher being Hastur ruled, as the lord of the castle.

The castle interior was an impregnable labyrinth.
The attraction was an experience where the prince himself would bestow a prize upon those who reached the deepest part.

name: Hastur
text:
W-What, you're too fast!!
And why are you here!?

options.text: I just happened to put on the thing you made.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Why? I gave you the most difficult door to pass through so you would get lost forever...!

options.text: You made it easy for me, didn't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Y-You fool! Who would do such a thing!?

options.text: I'm here, my beloved Hastur!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Y-You, saying such a terrible, blasphemous thing in that cute outfit!?

text: Hastur stared at the person in front of him. After all, they were his greatest desire.

He thought, 'Don't be fooled, this is a dangerous person.
You are my fated enemy whom I swore to destroy'.

For example, what would you do if an old acquaintance, who was like the personification
blasphemy, suddenly said, 'Oh no, I've become a human child'?

And on top of that, their appearance is unbelievably cute and endearing,
stirring up protective instincts, romantic feelings, and lust beyond their limits.

Then again, you're ■■■■■■■■■■■. Inside you, you are still that person.
I can't let my heart get carried away.

Just how many times have I nearly lost my mind,
having to crush my own head against a pillar to maintain my own sanity?

I'd rather ■■■ than having to fall in love with something like that.
I had to repeatedly tell myself to face reality.

options.text: So what's the reward...?
What are you going to give me~?
You have to keep your promise, right?

name: Hastur
text:
Ngh... Fine.
Here, take this, and disappear to wherever you came from.

Hastur threw the snacks he had
prepared for the children at [Player].

options.text: I'm not a child, you know?
These are for the children, right?
Is this my reward...?

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, what's with that expression?
What were you expecting?

name: Hastur
text:
Don't tell me,
you were expecting—

Hastur's presence intensified.
At the same time, tentacles began to appear from all over the room.

Hastur's entire body is a biological disaster.
No living thing can touch him and live to tell the tale.

name: Hastur
text:
Did you come here expecting this?
Did you foolishly come to face me, your fated enemy?

Hastur's tentacles slid
across [Player]'s skin.

name: Hastur
text:
Shall I defile your soul with my yellow mark,
and make you my slave? If you're scared, then—

options.text: No, no, that's not it!
It's so slimy!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't make weird noises!
I'm not going to be deceived by you!

options.text: My, body feels so hot...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't make weird noises!
I'm not going to be deceived by you!

name: Hastur
text:
Kuhaha, you came here so foolishly.
Now it's too late for you to lament or regret... Nghh!?

Just as [Player] was about to
fall into the sea of Hastur's tentacles—

name: Child
text:
Ah, the goal might be over there?
Let's go~!

name: Hastur
text:
Damn it, why do they always
interrupt at the best part— Huh!?

Hastur woke up, startled. It was a very realistic dream,
with the sensation of [Player]'s skin was still on his tentacles.

name: Hastur
text:
Damn it, I had such a dream, just because I promised to
go to the amusement park with [Player] after school...!

name: Hastur
text:
To think you would invade my dreams!
I won't forgive you when you show up next time!?

However, that afternoon, Hastur, who was surprisingly looking forward to it
despite his grumbling, visited the amusement park at the appointed time.

options.text: Sorry to keep you waiting, Hastur.
It's just the two of us today.
Were you looking forward to it?

name: Hastur
text:
I wasn't waiting for you!
Don't misunderstand me, you fool!

name: Hastur
text:
We have these amusement park passes now,
so I'm just here to make good use of them.

Contrary to his gruff words,
Hastur's tentacles unconsciously wrapped around [Player]'s waist.

options.text: Hastur, I didn't know you're this bold?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-No, that's not it, this is...
It's not my will, I swear!

options.text: This is a little bit embarrassing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-No, that's not it, this is...
It's not my will, I swear!

options.text: (Tease his tentacles)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whaaa!? Don't touch them, you fool!
I told you not to touch me!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I told you I'm a dangerous biological disaster!
If you're okay with your hand rotting away, then I won't stop you!

name: Hastur
text:
Did I let my guard down because of that weird dream this morning?
I need to get a hold of myself.

options.text: Eh, you too, Hastur...?
I had a dream about you too, Hastur.
Dreaming about each other means we're meant to be!

name: Hastur
text:
What, you had a dream about me too...?
I-I see, what a coincidence.

Hastur muttered in embarrassment under his breath,
but immediately afterwards, he realized the kind of being in front of him.

name: Hastur
text:
Wait...
Could it be that the dream was about Snowland Castle—

name: Hastur
text:
As I thought!?
You're the reason I had that dream!

name: Hastur
text:
It must have been caused by the 'memories' inside
of you having a telepathic influence on me.

name: Hastur
text:
How will you take responsibility for this!?
Because of you, I had to experience the worst dream of my life!

note:
sure, Hastur, go off
how about some puppy eyes?

options.text: I didn't do it on purpose, it was a coincidence!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If it wasn't your will, then it can't be helped, but...
It didn't affect anyone else, did it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Your dreams can affect reality and blur the line between them...
That would be dangerous for lesser beings.

options.text: Hastur, did you not like dreaming about me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
D-Don't make that sad face.
Now that you mention it, it wasn't that bad... perhaps.

options.text: (Flash him a sad look)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
D-Don't make that sad face.
Now that you mention it, it wasn't that bad... perhaps.

name: Hastur
text:
Well, let's not talk about that anymore.
We're at the amusement park, after all.

name: Hastur
text:
I decided to just go along with it today.
You are just a Summoner, so do not get the wrong idea!?

options.text: I wonder, how long will that last?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, as long as this dream lasts.
...It will last forever, as long as you want it to.

options.text: Please escort me, my prince.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I suppose it is my role.
It can't be helped, dear my fated nemesis and Summoner.

options.text: Then, let us hold hands.

dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]'s suggestion surprised him, but one of his tentacles hesitantly wrapped around [Player]'s hand.

name: Hastur
text:
Now, let us go, [Player].
Which attraction shall we conquer first?

The two of them went to the ride attraction that looked into the castle,
one of the most popular attractions in Snowland Castle.

Since it was one of the highlights,
there was a long line even on a weekday.

name: Hastur
text:
If it weren't for this act of waiting in line,
the amusement park would be an even more dreamlike place.

name: Hastur
text:
Shall I use my spatial leap to
take us to the front of the line?

options.text: That's just the fate of an amusement park~
This is part of the fun.
We can talk and get to know each other better during this time.

text:
A sign next to the line said '〇〇 minutes wait',
which was a decent amount of time to kill.

name: Hastur
text:
Even if I wanted to talk about something,
I don't have anything interesting to tell you.

name: Hastur
text:
Except when I'm with you,
I'm usually working for the Biological Disaster Countermeasures Unit.

name: Hastur
text:
Lately, I was auditing a university research facility.
They managed to control the airflow in the lab by creating negative pressure.

name: Hastur
text:
And, besides... I'm also planning to
watch Snegurochka's show with the dorm members.

name: Hastur
text:
If you came along...
Yuma and Alp would be very happy.

options.text: I'd love to go!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, make sure you submit a request for an overnight stay.
You can stay in my room without any problems.

options.text: You're really cute when you try to talk about something interesting~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
When people are trying to be considerate, you keep...
I won't say anything further, because I'm clearly unbothered by it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Or, how about I kill time with you instead?
Right here, just like in that dream―
Hastur sways his tentacles seductively towards [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha, did you really expect me to do that?
A higher being would never do such a thing in a children's paradise.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you really want me to, then let's go after 5, or rather, after 0, when the magic has faded.

options.text: I'm jealous of your friendships.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hmph, it was annoying when they started questioning me about when the two of us were alone at the amusement park.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: I don't usually go out with anyone other than them, so it's natural that they'd be suspicious.

name: Hastur
text:
Now, it's your turn to talk about yourself.
What have you been doing when I wasn't around?

As they talked to each other,
the line moved forward a bit.

Hastur would answer any questions he was asked,
but he was more interested in hearing [Player]'s stories.

options.text: I'm surprised you're so interested.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, is that so...? In this Tokyo, you are exactly to my liking―
Ahem, you've blended in so well that I couldn't help but be led astray.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: I've never disliked learning about human stories, but I am intrigued by the brilliance of your ephemeral lives.

options.text: I'm happy that we got to talk a lot.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gh... Is that so?
It wouldn't be bad for me to get to know you either.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: I've never disliked learning about human stories, but I am intrigued by the brilliance of your ephemeral lives.

options.text: Aren't you the one who's doing all the talking?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine as long as I get to hear in return, yes?
I actually do enjoy learning about human stories.

name: Hastur
text:
In the library I once owned,
I would have my familiars collect human stories.

name: Hastur
text:
I even learned my other alias,
'Crown Prince of Evil', from those books.

options.text: You had a library!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, are you that surprised?
It's not a library of the scale you're imagining.

options.text: Hastur, you are surprisingly intelligent...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You...
Just what on earth do you think of me!?

options.text: I don't think I've heard this story before...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I've never told anyone before, so it's natural that you've never heard it.
I don't like talking about myself to begin with.

name: Hastur
text:
I've talked about it a little bit, but my realm is one of eternal loneliness,
so there was nothing to do but to immerse myself in a book.

name: Hastur
text:
To be honest, I've always had a thought that you only see me
as a mere lizard that scrurries around, don't you?

name: Hastur
text:
I, who stand before you now,
is a great ruler who once commanded a star cluster.

name: Hastur
text:
I'm a great being, so great that I can't
be categorized by human standards like 'prince' or 'emperor'.

name: Hastur
text:
That's why you should be proud that you are so lucky.
This is what you humans call a "Cinderella" story, is it not?

Hastur puffed out his chest,
proud of his knowledge of human culture.

name: Hastur
text:
You are also a human student now.
You shouldn't be so lazy and should read a book or two.

name: Hastur
text:
You should learn from your classmate... what was his name again?
You should at least try to take after him.

name: Hastur
text:
Lesser humans have always used knowledge
as power to overcome the terrors of the unknown.

name: Hastur
text:
As a result, countless have gone mad, from approaching the abyss
of knowledge that is beyond the limits of their being.

name: Hastur
text:
But for you, [Player],
you have no such worries, do you?

options.text: Then you should teach me, Hastur.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You, asking me to teach you? Hahaha!
Alright, I'll hold a study session of something that you can't even comprehend.

options.text: In return, I'll teach you more about humans.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You, asking me to teach you? Hahaha!
Alright, I'll hold a study session of something that you can't even comprehend.

options.text: I'll be fine, because I'm only a human.

dialogue_after_selection.text: Hastur was about to say something, but he stopped himself, perhaps thinking it would ruin the mood.

text:
And as the two of them were talking, their turn came,
and they were led into the castle.

name: Hastur
text:
Haha, welcome to my castle, my partner.
This great Hastur will be your escort.

As he said that, Hastur's
tentacles slithered around [Player]'s body.

After visiting a few attractions, the two of them
stopped by a shop in the amusement park for a coffee break.

name: Hastur
text:
Amusement parks are not too bad, it seems.
The feeling of speed and gravity is quite interesting.

name: Hastur
text:
Even though interstellar travel takes but a moment,
that roller coaster was a very novel ride for me.

Hastur was gnawing on a turkey leg, bone and all,
as he reflected on the attractions they had ridden.

name: Hastur
text:
But... perhaps because I've been to the departure ceremony and
this amusement park in this outfit so often, I've been standing out a little bit too much.

options.text: People did say that we look good together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I couldn't believe my ears when I heard that.
Me, with you, in the form of a lower being...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, well, I guess that's how it looks to humans.
I was about to get offended, but I graciously forgave them!

options.text: Of course you stand out, you're cool, Hastur.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
The flustered Hastur accidentally crushed the drink he was
holding with his tentacles, spilling the contents all over the place.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I told you already!
Stop saying such things so casually!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: I don't know how to react to that, and it's driving me insane!

options.text: I'm starting to get addicted to it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm quite used to it now, and having you by my side...
I suppose that helped me.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 1]

options.text: You were so flustered, though.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Shut up, you fool!
I was just happy because I thought it meant that the outfit suited me!?

options.text: Your tentacles were all over the place.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Shut up, you fool!
I was just happy because I thought it meant that the outfit suited me!?

options.text: You were happy about it, weren't you~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Shut up, you fool!
I was just happy because I thought it meant that the outfit suited me!?

text: The food and drink that [Player] ordered arrived shortly after.

name: Hastur
text:
Your order looks exquisite...
Give it here, it's mine now!

options.text: I guess I have no choice...

dialogue_after_selection.text: Hastur closed his eyes and reluctantly took a bite of the food offered to him.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's delicious, I'll have to try the other things too.
I have more things to look forward to the next time I come.

options.text: If only you feed me first.

dialogue_after_selection.text: Hastur propped his head on his hand and reluctantly fed [Player] with his tentacles.
However, his eyes were fixed on [Player], until the food was swallowed.

options.text: (Offer him a takoyaki)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: I can't believe you chose this from all the menus. You're questioning my taste, aren't you?
Hastur closed his eyes and reluctantly took a bite of the food offered to him.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's a strange feeling... I guess you and octopus don't have much in common after all, just as the humans say.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 2]

options.text: ...You're staring too much.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You fool, I have to watch you to make sure you eat it!
Stop making such unfounded accusations against a higher being!

options.text: I felt a perverted gaze just now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You fool, I have to watch you to make sure you eat it!
Stop making such unfounded accusations against a higher being!

options.text: You're so secretive~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You fool, I have to watch you to make sure you eat it!
Stop making such unfounded accusations against a higher being!

text:
To an outsider, the two of them spent time together in a blissful haze,
that can only be described like a couple on a date—

When they went outside, the park was already nearing closing time,
and the attractions were beginning to light up.

name: Hastur
text:
It seems like we're short on time.
Shall I pick the last attraction?

Hastur chose the Ferris wheel, one of the most
memorable places in the amusement park for the two of them.

name: Hastur
text:
Since it's after 5, time is limited,
so we won't be able to ride everything.

options.text: We can come again.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I suppose, since we can use the pass as much as we want.
We should make the most of the fact that coming here is so easy.

options.text: Let's save it for next time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, aren't you foolishly optimistic?
That's one of the things I find endearing about humans.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even with your fleeting lives, you can still afford to live so earnestly―

options.text: I really had fun today.

name: Hastur
text:
I'll say it, I had fun today, [Player].
I never thought I could experience such an extraordinary day just by coming here.

name: Hastur
text:
For me, Tokyo itself is an extraordinary place,
full of freshness, but this moment was especially memorable.

name: Hastur
text:
Next time, I'll return the favor.
Just before the park closes, we'll ride the Ferris wheel again, and return to reality.

options.text: That's a great idea.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hah, aren't I thoughtful?
I'll become your very own prince every time we do that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: In exchange for that, you'll be my companion.

options.text: How romantic~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hah, aren't I thoughtful?
I'll become your very own prince every time we do that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: In exchange for that, you'll be my companion.

options.text: We're basically dating!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you still asleep?
Wake up, who do you think is in front of you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I am the great King in Yellow, Hastur!
Do you think I would go to the amusement park alone with you for nothing?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I must say, you lack a sense of self-awareness.
You are already an object of interest for the Old One, Hastur.

text:
Just like in the dream, Hastur's presence intensified.
It was the power he usually suppressed for humans.

name: Hastur
text:
This time, I will no longer think of you as a human.
I will make you submit and know your place!

The Ferris wheel was nearing the top.
At that moment, it became one of the least seen places in all of Tokyo.

name: Hastur
text:
Alright, [Player].
This is an order from the Old One, Hastur.

options.text: I don't like being dominated.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
The moment [Player] said that,
the overpowering presence in the gondola was overturned.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Guh... damn you, [Player]!
You just had to defy me, you bastard!?

options.text: The question of who is superior hasn't been decided.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
The moment [Player] said that,
the overpowering presence in the gondola was overturned.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Guh... damn you, [Player]!
You just had to defy me, you bastard!?

options.text: Yes, my king.

dialogue_after_selection.text: Hastur's hand and countless tentacles were held out to [Player] to show his superiority.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 1 or 2]

options.text: That's not what I meant.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I see, my sworn enemy.
You're still trying to claim we're equals?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, fine, I'll dance with you.
Which came first, the egg or the chicken—

options.text: Let's continue playing with together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I see, my sworn enemy.
You're still trying to claim we're equals?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, fine, I'll dance with you.
Which came first, the egg or the chicken—

options.text: I know you love me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I see, my sworn enemy.
You're still trying to claim we're equals?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, fine, I'll dance with you.
Which came first, the egg or the chicken—

options.text: (Lean against Hastur's shoulder)

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hastur, who had been living for a long time, thought to himself,
'Maybe I've been waiting for this moment—'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Stay close to me, [Player].
This time, I will make this moment a happy ending.

options.text: (Give Hastur a kiss)

dialogue_after_selection.text: In the space of an instant that felt like an eternity, the gondola was filled with Hastur's tentacles, writhing, squirming.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Stay close to me, [Player].
This time, I will make this moment a happy ending.

options.text: (Be kissed by Hastur)

dialogue_after_selection.text: In the space of an instant that felt like an eternity, the gondola was filled with Hastur's tentacles, writhing, squirming.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm tired of being toyed with, [Player]...!
You will stay by this Hastur's side and fill my loneliness.

text:
It was a time as sweet as mead,
and once discovered, there was no turning back—

The location was the castle of the King in Yellow, Hastur.
[Player] was standing right before him.

Noisy music and cheers— or perhaps sounds of blessing—
could be heard from all around.

options.text: Aren't you going to dance, Hastur?
Let us dance, my king.

name: Hastur
text:
Ah, that's right.
I'll enjoy this a little longer.

Hastur took their hand and,
as to confirm their feelings, his tentacles slithered across them.

Was this reality or a dream—
No one could tell anymore.

Which would win?
Reality, consumed by the plague of 'love'—
Or the dream, consumed by the fever of 'love'—
Hastur and [Player]'s new battle had just begun.
